title: The Red Empire and Other Stories
description: Joe McKinney's debut collection, The Red Empire & Other Stories, brings together eight tales of haunted policemen and cosmic horrors...A chance encounter with a homeless man one hot summer night opens the doors of perception for a Houston beat cop...Genetically engineered fire ants threaten to devour a small Texas border town, and the only thing in their way is a grief-stricken county man...
author: Joe McKinney
